Package gw.pl.io

Class StringLineWriter

java.lang.Object
gw.pl.io.StringLineWriter
public class StringLineWriter extends Object
Allows line-by-line manipulation of a string.
Author:
kprevas

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    StringLineWriter()
    Constructs a new, empty writer.
    StringLineWriter(String source)
    Constructs a new writer from the contents of a string.

  • Method Details

    • getLine

      public String getLine(int lineNumber)
      Gets the contents of the line at the given line number.
      Parameters:
      lineNumber - The 1-indexed line number.
      Returns:
      The contents of the line, with no line break.

    • setLine

      public void setLine(int lineNumber, Object contents)
      Replaces the contents of a line.
      Parameters:
      lineNumber - The 1-indexed line number.
      contents - The new contents of the line, with no line break.

    • appendToLine

      public void appendToLine(int lineNumber, Object contents)
      Appends some content to the end of a line.
      Parameters:
      lineNumber - The 1-indexed line number.
      contents - The contents to append, with no line break.

    • removeLine

      public void removeLine(int lineNumber)
      Removes a line.
      Parameters:
      lineNumber - The 1-indexed line number.

    • appendLine

      public void appendLine(Object contents)
      Appends a new line with the given contents.
      Parameters:
      contents - The contents of the new line, with no line break.

    • insertLine

      public void insertLine(int lineNumber, Object contents)
      Inserts a line with the given contents at the given index.
      Parameters:
      lineNumber - The 1-indexed line number.
      contents - The contents of the new line, with no line break.

    • getNumLines

      public int getNumLines()
      Returns the number of lines.
